name: Disaster Would Be Natural
description:
Disaster Would Be Natural About

Submission for GMTK Jam 2020.

This poor tornado is having a major dilemma: being an out of control natural disaster, how can he keep from hurting the little people in his path? Head for the ocean! And do as little damage as you can along the way...

Make sure to press the button at the bottom left of the player to maximize the game, or else the view will be squished!

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Left Shift to dash in the direction you're moving.
